title: Mr. Belani receives the Ambassador of the United States of America to Algeria
text: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the National Community abroad, Mr. Amar Belani, received Thursday, the Ambassador of the United States of America to Algeria, Elizabeth Moore Aubin.

The meeting allowed the two parties to discuss bilateral relations and ways to develop them in various areas, and exchange views on regional and international issues of common interest, including the latest developments of the Sahrawi issue at the diplomatic and judicial.

The two parties also discussed the efforts made by the Personal Envoy of the UN Secretary General to Western Sahara, Staffan de Mistura, to revive the political negotiation process between the two parties to the conflict, Kingdom of Morocco and Polisario Front, based on good faith and without preconditions, in accordance with relevant UN resolutions.
The talks between the two parties also focused on Algeria's tireless efforts to promote stability and security in the region.
